tool_description: Validates the quality and completeness of extracted text by checking for common OCR errors, missing characters, formatting issues, and legal document completeness indicators.

extracted_text.description: Text content to validate for quality

expected_word_count.description: Expected approximate word count for completeness check

check_legal_completeness.description: Validate presence of essential legal document elements

language.description: Language code for spell-checking and validation

strict_validation.description: Apply strict validation rules for critical documents

error_messages: Empty text input: Provide non-empty extracted_text for validation.
Unsupported language: Use a supported ISO 639-1 language code.
Invalid word count: expected_word_count must be a positive integer.
Validation failed: Unable to complete quality analysis on the provided text.
usage: Input extracted_text from OCR processing. Set check_legal_completeness to true for contracts and agreements. Use strict_validation for critical legal documents.

missing_elements.description: Missing legal document elements if applicable

quality_rating.description: Quality rating: excellent, good, acceptable, poor
